fathom.comment: Fathom AI MCP - Search and retrieve meeting information (Claude Code)
setup: 1. Clone the Fathom MCP server: git clone https://github.com/sourcegate/mcp-fathom-server
2. Install dependencies: cd mcp-fathom-server && npm install && npm run build
3. Get your API key from https://app.fathom.video → Settings → API
5. Update the 'args' path above to point to your cloned repo's dist/index.js file
7. Ask Claude Code: 'Find meetings about [topic] and summarize key decisions'

notes.claude-code: This config is for Claude Code CLI only
notes.why-atlassian-removed: Atlassian MCP requires Claude.ai web interface with OAuth integration, not available in Claude Code CLI
